meanings.definition: The state or quality of being torrid.
meanings.sent1: The torridities of the desert made it difficult to stay cool.
meanings.sent2: The torridities of summer in the city can be unbearable.
meanings.sent3: Despite the torridities, the ice cream shop had a line out the door.
meanings.sent4: Her anger burned with the torridities of a blazing fire.
meanings.sent5: The torridities of passion engulfed their hearts in flames.

meanings.sent1: The torridities of the oven made the kitchen sweltering.
meanings.sent2: The torridities of the drought caused crops to wither.
meanings.sent3: The torridities of the sun turned the sand into a scorching oven.
meanings.sent4: The torridities of the desert sun baked the landscape to a crisp.
meanings.sent5: The torridities of the sauna enveloped him in a blanket of heat.
